reviews.text: We stayed at the Albury Manor House on March 13th 2009 and on March 28th 2009.
reviews.title: Not too bad

reviews.text: On 13/03/2009 we stayed in room 4 which was right next to the dining room and was therefore a little noisy, but it was fine during the night. Room four was a handicapped room, so it had a wet room which meant the whole bathroom was quite wet after a shower. We bought the full breakfast, can't remember the name of it, but it wasn't too bad especially since it was buy one get one free.
reviews.title: Very satisfactory, not brilliant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On our way back through we were in a different room which seemed to be a little bigger than room 4 and was a normal room with a normal bathroom.
reviews.title: Excellent Value
Terrific value for quality meals
reviews.text: All in all I would be more than happy to stay here again, especially considering the rate we got on wotif.com.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Firstly, for the price we paid per night, it was brilliant. If we had to pay full price, then there must be better on offer elsewhere, I think. The staff were very friendly. The restaurant, in my book, was average, nothing brilliant and the breakfast ordinary. The location was very good for proximity to town and to the main highway. Car parking was ample. The whole overal experience was good but the premises have room for improvement.
reviews.title: True hospitality

likes.liked: — The Beautiful Buliding Design and great staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Ideal stopover enroute Sydney to Melbourne

reviews.text: On 1st glance it seems a little odd-Tudor exterior with 4 poster beds! I booked it on wotif because we had just returned from a long OS trip and I simply couldn’t face drivng straight to Melbourne. So now we have stayed here 3 times in the last year, it is just off the Highway, extremely quiet and comfortable. Get a good night’s sleep then only another 3 ½ hours to arrive in Melbourne.
reviews.title: disapponting

reviews.text: Staff are friendly and welcoming, rooms spotlessly clean,secure free parking and a small pool for a refreshing dip.
reviews.title: Exactly what I want

reviews.text: The 4 poster rooms are a good deal larger than the standard room we had last time and worth the extra few dollars.
reviews.title: The place for a stopover

reviews.text: Still haven’t tried the restaurant-the 1st couple of times it was booked out for functions, and the last time we just had a fast food option in the town. On that note-it IS a country town and we just squeaked in at 8.30 because the ‘kitchen had closed mate’
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel with exceptional service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We recently stayed at the Manor House, Albury on our way from Melbourne to Canberra and loved every minute we stayed there. The friendliness and professionalism of the staff was a very good first impression at check-in and our room was fantastic value for money...so much more than we expected! We had a swim in the pool and lounged in the sauna then headed to the hotel restaurant for dinner. The food and service was of a very high standard and we would have no hesitation in recommending this hotel.
reviews.title: A Wonderful Surprise in Albury

likes.disliked: — that we could only stay one night

reviews.text: On the long drive from Melbourne to Sydney we stopped overnight at the Albury Manor House and were very glad that we did. The twin share room price was very reasonable and we found the facilities were of a much higher standard than this price range usually offers.
reviews.title: A great place to stay!

likes.liked: — Large clean rooms and great restaurant. Good value for money.
likes.disliked: — TV could be a bit bigger

reviews.text: With the new highway bypass around Albury I could have been tempted to travel through to Melbourne but instead chose to have a return visit to this hotel. The staff were friendly and helpful and the chef prepared the fish to perfection. The hotel is consistently classy, clean and the furnishings are tasteful. A short walk from the cinema so no need to drive. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Country hospitality with city style

reviews.text: Stayed overnight at this hotel en route from Melbourne to Canberra and was pleased with everything. Although both the indoor pool and spa were too cold for me personally, the kids appreciated having a quick dip after the long drive. Probably wouldn't choose this hotel if I was staying in Albury for several days, but for an overnight stop-over would happily recommend it.
reviews.title: Good stop-over between Melbourne & Canberra

likes.liked: — Dip in indoor pool was nice for kids after long drive

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have stayed at this hotel quite a few time . The rooms are great for the price you pay. The staff are friendly and helpful. Breakfast was great and at a reasonable price also. The only downside was that once we got a room with an interconnecting door, we could hear everything the family in the other room where saying. So when you book try and ask for a room with no interconnecting doors. I can definitely recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Great place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have stayed at the Albury Manor twice in recent months and both times have been very impressed with the standard of rooms and level of service. Firstly, the cost is amazing. The rooms are spacious and clean. For the price I was expecting a grotty old hotel room but I would honestly say the Manor is cleaner and more comfortable than many 5 star hotels I've stayed in. There is room to move (a choice of three beds in our room! lol), the bathrooms are spacious and every thing is clean and quiet. I cringe at the thought of staying in a hotel/motel that isn't a well known brand but I was not disappointed in any way with the Manor. Would not hesitate to recommend and will stay again without a doubt.
reviews.title: Great value
Good but could do with a makeover
reviews.text: Very hospitable and proffessional staff. The hotel is in a convenient location only minutes from the main shops in Dean Street. The motel is reasonably priced and the downstairs restaurant and bar are an added bonus. The rooms are old english and add a touch of romance however a relatively minor makeover could really make this place live up to its four star rating, (ie new carpet ). Overall though it was a pleasant stay.
